meanings.definition: A type of electronic oscillator that generates its own frequency
meanings.sent1: The autodynes in the radio help produce the correct frequency.
meanings.sent2: I learned about autodynes in my electronics class.
meanings.sent3: The autodynes at the concert kept the music playing smoothly.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an autodyne, always generating new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The autodynes hummed softly, creating a harmonious sound.

meanings.definition: Devices that use feedback to maintain a constant output frequency
meanings.sent1: The autodynes in the system ensure a steady frequency.
meanings.sent2: We need to check the autodynes to keep the frequency stable.
meanings.sent3: The autodynes at work never seem to take a break!
meanings.sent4: His heart worked like autodynes, always staying in rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The autodynes beeped consistently, signaling everything was working well.

meanings.definition: A system that automatically adjusts its frequency to match an incoming signal
meanings.sent1: The autodynes in the device adapt quickly to new signals.
meanings.sent2: The autodynes are crucial for adjusting to different frequencies.
meanings.sent3: The autodynes in the car radio never miss a beat.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was like autodynes, changing with each conversation.
meanings.sent5: The autodynes smoothly transitioned to the new frequency, impressing everyone.
